speakers.name: Daco Harkes
speakers.bio: Software Engineer at Google - Seamless interop between #Dart and native code

speakers.name: Hossein Yousefi
speakers.bio: Software Engineer at Google - Make interop fluid between Dart and Java/Kotlin

title: The past, present, and future of native interop
description: Join us as we share our vision for a more seamless and efficient way to bridge the gap between Flutter and native code, empowering developers to create high-performance, feature-rich apps. We'll demonstrate how JNIgen/FFIgen simplifies native interop, discuss its potential impact on plugin development, and outline our roadmap for the future. Whether you're an app developer or a plugin developer, this talk will provide valuable insights into the evolving landscape of Flutter native interop.
